summary: When a mysterious planet crosses the sun, global catastrophes are unleashed. A rogue scientist is the key to deciphering the symbols and humanity's only chance at survival.
cast: Joel Gretsch|Aaron Douglas|Reilly Dolman|Emily Holmes|Andrea Brooks|Ben Cotton|Christopher Lloyd|Douglas Chapman|Russell Roberts|Raf Rogers|Wolfgang Klassen|Jessica Storm Smith
title: Los signos del apocalipsis
